16  package org.jboss.hal.testsuite.test.configuration.infinispan.cache.container.scattered.cache.configuration;
17  
18  import org.jboss.arquillian.core.api.annotation.Inject;
19  import org.jboss.arquillian.graphene.page.Page;
20  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.Console;
21  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.CrudOperations;
22  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.Random;
23  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.container.WildFlyContainer;
24  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.fragment.FormFragment;
25  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.page.configuration.ScatteredCachePage;
26  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.test.Manatoko;
27  import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeAll;
28  import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach;
29  import org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer;
30  import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
31  import org.junit.jupiter.api.TestMethodOrder;
32  import org.testcontainers.junit.jupiter.Container;
33  import org.testcontainers.junit.jupiter.Testcontainers;
34  import org.wildfly.extras.creaper.core.online.OnlineManagementClient;
35  import org.wildfly.extras.creaper.core.online.operations.Operations;
36  
37  import static org.jboss.hal.dmr.ModelDescriptionConstants.ENABLED;
38  import static org.jboss.hal.dmr.ModelDescriptionConstants.JGROUPS;
39  import static org.jboss.hal.dmr.ModelDescriptionConstants.TRANSPORT;
40  import static org.jboss.hal.testsuite.container.WildFlyConfiguration.FULL_HA;
41  import static org.jboss.hal.testsuite.fixtures.InfinispanFixtures.cacheContainerAddress;
42  import static org.jboss.hal.testsuite.fixtures.InfinispanFixtures.partitionHandlingAddress;
43  import static org.jboss.hal.testsuite.fixtures.InfinispanFixtures.scatteredCacheAddress;
44  
45  @Manatoko
46  @Testcontainers
47  @TestMethodOrder(MethodOrderer.MethodName.class)
48  class PartitionHandlingTest {
49  
50      private static final String CACHE_CONTAINER = "cache-container-" + Random.name();
51      private static final String SCATTERED_CACHE_PART_HANDLING = "scattered-cache-" + Random.name();
52      @Container static WildFlyContainer wildFly = WildFlyContainer.standalone(FULL_HA);
53      private static Operations operations;
54  
55      @BeforeAll
56      static void setupModel() throws Exception {
57          OnlineManagementClient client = wildFly.managementClient();
58          operations = new Operations(client);
59          operations.add(cacheContainerAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER));
60          operations.add(cacheContainerAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER).and(TRANSPORT, JGROUPS));
61          operations.add(scatteredCacheAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER, SCATTERED_CACHE_PART_HANDLING));
62          operations.removeIfExists(partitionHandlingAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER, SCATTERED_CACHE_PART_HANDLING));
63      }
64  
65      @Inject CrudOperations crud;
66      @Inject Console console;
67      @Page ScatteredCachePage page;
68      FormFragment form;
69  
70      @BeforeEach
71      void setup() {
72          page.navigate(CACHE_CONTAINER, SCATTERED_CACHE_PART_HANDLING);
73          console.verticalNavigation().selectPrimary("scattered-cache-item");
74          form = page.getPartitionHandlingForm();
75      }
76  
77      @Test
78      void create() throws Exception {
79          crud.createSingleton(partitionHandlingAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER, SCATTERED_CACHE_PART_HANDLING), form);
80      }
81  
82      @Test
83      void remove() throws Exception {
84          crud.deleteSingleton(partitionHandlingAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER, SCATTERED_CACHE_PART_HANDLING), form);
85      }
86  
87      @Test
88      void editToggleEnabled() throws Exception {
89          boolean enabled = operations.readAttribute(partitionHandlingAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER, SCATTERED_CACHE_PART_HANDLING),
90                  ENABLED)
91                  .booleanValue(false);
92          crud.update(partitionHandlingAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER, SCATTERED_CACHE_PART_HANDLING), form, ENABLED, !enabled);
93      }
94  
95  }
Copyright © 2022–2023 Red Hat. All rights reserved.
